relproducts.description: This 25mm coral orange venetian blind adds a saturated shade of orange to your room. Their venetian blinds are fantastic for privacy and light control, with the angled slats providing natural uv protection. 25mm venetian blinds also offer a slim in profile - perfect for tricky windows and doors where space-saving is important. As with all their made to measure products, this metal venetian blinds comes with a five year guarantee and customer-first service.

relproducts.title: Cloud Burst Rainbow Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Who knew the rain clouds could be bursting with such colour? relproducts.title: Phoebe Rainbow - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Once the phoebe rainbow is on display, there's no missing it. A contemporary and somewhat abstract floral pattern displays rose pinks, sunshine yellows, and citrus oranges, as well as apple greens and petrol blues, forming a plethora of colour across the canvas. Use the rainbow in any room where you want to make a statement. A room with plenty of sunlight will complement this blind best, and surround it with similar sunny yellow and oranges for a cheery, uplifting look.

relproducts.title: Rainforest Rainbow Roman Blind
relproducts.description: Colour is the hallmark of clarissa hulse's work and it doesn't get much more colourful than this vibrant rainforest rainbow roman blind design. Inspired by costa rican cloud forests the tropical ferns are picked out in a multititude of bright hues. This blind will make a spectacu colour is the hallmark of clarissa hulse's work and it doesn't get much more colourful than this vibrant rainforest rainbow roman blind design.

relproducts.title: Harper Rainbow - Roman Blind
relproducts.description: With a rainbow of colour and an explosion of shades that give this offering from the harper range its name you'll be able to add something enticing and eclectic to your interior. The real depth stems from the intriguing contrast between the zesty oranges and calmer pinks. A light blue feature wall and a light brown laminate floor are great ways to introduce this symphony of colour into the living room.
